main event: A police officer observed a silvery, disc-shaped object hovering about 200 feet above the ground in Kettering, Ohio on 9 July 1966.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 30 feet in diameter.,The object made no sound and remained motionless for about 5 minutes before accelerating rapidly.,The officer had 8 years of experience and had never seen anything like it before.,The sighting was reported to police headquarters immediately.,The report is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
witness description: Police officer, Patrolman John P. Smith, with 8 years of experience
